title: Bears offseason grade/draft plans, Josh Allen red flags
description:
Tom Fornelli joins Will Brinson to break down the Bears offseason, assign them a grade and then look at their best and worst case scenarios for the draft. Tom, a CBS Sports College Football Writer, also ranks the six quarterbacks in the draft and explains why Josh Allen has red flags, where would be a good spot for Lamar Jackson to land, why Baker Mayfield is the best quarterback in the draft, if he has concerns with Josh Rosen and if he would trade Mitchell Trubisky for Deshaun Watson.
